participant_1.name: Tom
participant_1.personality: Frustrated and introspective, Tom often feels overwhelmed by his circumstances but seeks a way out.
participant_1.background: i hate my job. i'm planning on getting a divorce. my wife spends all my money. i work as a car salesman.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Optimistic and passionate, Emily is determined to pursue her dreams of making it as a musician despite the struggles.
participant_2.background: i am a musician and hope to make it big some day. i play the piano and guitar and sing. i also work as a custodian to help pay the bills. my favorite type of music to sing is folk music.

content.text: between wife   job with no money   i am thinking now of divorce
that is wonderful   i need my hair done
